Functions

void cvl_init (void)

Detailed Description

Library initialization.

Function Documentation

void cvl_init ( void   ) 

Initializes CVL, using the currently active OpenGL context.
After calling this function, the application can use cvl_error() and cvl_error_msg() to query the CVL error status.
Initialization includes correct setup of all OpenGL extensions (via GLEW).

void cvl_deinit ( void   ) 

Deinitializes CVL and frees all allocated ressources.
